text: Va ʙa jod ovared ne'mati Allohro ʙar xeş va [niz] pajmone, ki şumoro ʙa [ançomi] on muvazzaf gardondaast, on goh ki [dar ʙorai da'vat ʙa farmonʙardorī ʙa pajomʙar] gufted: "Şunidem va itoat kardem". Va az Alloh taolo parvo kuned [ʙitarsed], [ki] ʙe tardid, Alloh taolo ʙa on ci daruni sinahost, donost
